tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Drug_Users(
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(255),
    user_age INT,
    user_gender VARCHAR(10),
    user_drug_id INT REFERENCES Drug_Interactions(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Drug_Effects (
    drug_id INT,
    effect_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (drug_id, effect_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug_Interactions(drug_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (effect_id) REFERENCES Adverse_Effects(effect_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patient_Drug_History (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_id INT,
    dosage INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug_Interactions(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DrugInteraction (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_id_1 INT,
  drug_id_2 INT,
  interaction_effect TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id_1) REFERENCES Drug(drug_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id_2) REFERENCES Drug(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DrugEffect (
  drug_id INT,
  effect_id INT,
  effect_severity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug(drug_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (effect_id) REFERENCES AdverseEffect(effect_id)
);
